description: Mango lassi is a delightful and refreshing Indian drink made with ripe mangoes and yogurt. It's creamy, smooth, and bursting with sweet mango flavor.
steps: In a blender, combine the diced mangoes, plain yogurt, milk, sugar or honey, and cardamom powder (if using).
Blend until smooth and creamy. If the lassi is too thick, you can add more milk to reach your desired consistency.
Add ice cubes to the blender and blend again until the lassi is chilled and frothy.
Taste the lassi and adjust the sweetness according to your preference by adding more sugar or honey if needed.
Pour the mango lassi into glasses and garnish with saffron strands and chopped pistachios or almonds if desired.
Serve immediately and enjoy the refreshing taste of mango lassi!
